titleStmt.title: Gods working and Brittains wonder. A sermon congratulating the most happy establishment of His sacred Majesty Charls the II. on His throne. Presented to the Kings most Excellent Majtie [sic]. By a person of honor. By Wil. Price B.D. late preacher of Covent-Garden, now to the Reformed English Church in Amsterdam.
titleStmt.author: Price, William, d. 1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W. Godbid for Peter Dring at the Sun in the Poultrey, next dore to the Rose tavern,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Sun in the Poultrey, next dore to the Rose tavern
